text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, shaytan ke nakshe qadam par na chalo, uski pairwi (jo) koi karega to woh usey fahash (indecency) aur badi (wickedness) hi ka hukum dega.Agar Allah ka fazal aur uska reham o karam tumpar na hota to tum mein se koi shaks paak na ho sakta, magar Allah hi jisey chahta hai paak kardeta hai, aur Allah sunnay wala aur jaanney wala hai
